edu.wpi.first.wpilibj

Class SensorBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.SensorBase
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ADXL345_I2C, ADXL345_SPI, ADXL362, AnalogAccelerometer, AnalogInput, AnalogOutput, Compressor, Counter, DigitalGlitchFilter, Encoder, GyroBase, I2C, InterruptableSensorBase, PowerDistributionPanel, PWM, Relay, SolenoidBase, SPI, Ultrasonic

    public abstract class SensorBase
extends Object
    Base class for all sensors. Stores most recent status information as well as containing utility functions for checking channels and error processing.
